name: SPACE BALL (itch) (Zinkenite, castlebbs, StarGarnet)
description:
Try to get your best high score with this Space Pinball.
Send the ORB through the Alien for the most points! Have fun!

It is our first 3D game in Godot!

Controls

Use the Arrow Keys or A and D to rotate the paddles.
Click [space]  to launch the ORB

Credits

Zinkenite: 3D Art and coding 
StarGarnet: UI Design
Castlebbs: Music
Woosis: Testing

Sound effects: freesound.org
